action_plan.name: Action Plan
action_plan.description: Transform research into concrete, actionable recommendations. Step 4 of the research chain.

content_analysis.name: Content Analysis
content_analysis.description: Systematically analyze web content, breaking it down into key components.

deep_analysis.name: Deep Analysis Chain
deep_analysis.description: Progressive analysis workflow for thorough research. Scans the topic, deep dives into key areas, synthesizes findings, and produces a structured notepage for reference.

arguments.name: topic
arguments.description: The topic or subject to analyze

arguments.name: focus_areas
arguments.description: Specific areas to emphasize in the analysis

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: Background context or prior knowledge to consider

deep_investigation.name: Deep Investigation
deep_investigation.description: Thorough research with sources, evidence, and expert perspectives. Step 2 of the research chain. BLOCKING gate requires citations.

arguments.name: focus_areas
arguments.description: Prioritized areas from the initial scan

deep_research.name: Deep Research Framework
deep_research.description: A comprehensive framework for conducting thorough, methodical research on complex topics with academic rigor.

arguments.name: topic
arguments.description: The research topic to investigate comprehensively

initial_scan.name: Initial Scan
initial_scan.description: Broad overview and key themes identification

note_integration.name: Note Integration
note_integration.description: Integrate new information from a markdown page into existing notes, merging them smoothly while maintaining a logical structure and avoiding duplication.

arguments.name: notes
arguments.description: The existing notes to integrate into

arguments.name: new_information
arguments.description: The new information to be integrated

note_refinement.name: Advanced Note Refinement (Integration Chain)
note_refinement.description: Advanced workflow that runs a comprehensive content analysis chain to transform raw content into publication-ready, interconnected notes optimized for Obsidian knowledge management systems.

arguments.name: content
arguments.description: The raw content to be processed and integrated

arguments.name: existing_notes
arguments.description: Any existing notes to preserve and integrate with

arguments.name: vault_context
arguments.description: Context about the vault structure and existing content

arguments.name: domain
arguments.description: Knowledge domain for appropriate formatting strategy

arguments.name: enhancement_level
arguments.description: Enhancement intensity: standard, comprehensive, showcase (default: comprehensive)

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Enhanced notes chain that searches the vault for actual related notes instead of generating fictional ones - UPDATED"

arguments.name: video_url
arguments.description: YouTube video URL for visual extraction

progressive_research.name: Progressive Research Assistant
progressive_research.description: A step-by-step research assistant that builds knowledge incrementally through iterative questions and analysis.

arguments.name: notes
arguments.description: The initial notes or information to research and expand on

arguments.name: information
arguments.description: Additional context or information to guide the research

query_refinement.name: Query Refinement
query_refinement.description: A systematic process to analyze and refine ambiguous coding requests into clear, actionable specifications.

arguments.name: query
arguments.description: The original user query to refine

research_chain.name: Research & Analysis Chain
research_chain.description: Complete research workflow: initial scan, deep investigation with sources, synthesis, and actionable recommendations. Demonstrates blocking citation gate.

arguments.name: purpose
arguments.description: Why you need this research (decision, learning, project, etc.)

research_synthesis.name: Research Synthesis
research_synthesis.description: Consolidate and reconcile findings into coherent insights. Step 3 of the research chain.

review.name: review
review.description: Comprehensive audit template for modules, implementations, and system integrations

arguments.name: target
arguments.description: The module, implementation, system, or functionality to audit (e.g., '@/ path implementation', 'Musi

codebase_protocol_init.name: Codebase Protocol Initialization
codebase_protocol_init.description: Bootstrap a T3-style project with full protocol setup, tooling, and documentation updates.

arguments.name: repo_path
arguments.description: Absolute path to the target workspace

arguments.name: tech_stack
arguments.description: Short description of the expected stack

obsidian_metadata_optimizer.name: Obsidian Metadata Optimizer
obsidian_metadata_optimizer.description: Creates comprehensive, intelligent metadata and frontmatter for Obsidian notes, optimizing for discoverability, organization, and advanced plugin functionality

arguments.name: note_content
arguments.description: The note content to analyze for metadata creation

vault_related_notes_finder.name: Vault Related Notes Finder
vault_related_notes_finder.description: Searches vault for actual related notes using content analysis and glob/grep patterns to find real cross-references

arguments.name: content_areas
arguments.description: Key content areas covered in the note

video_notes_enhanced.name: Enhanced Video Notes Chain
video_notes_enhanced.description: Comprehensive video processing chain including content analysis, deep insights, and vault integration.

arguments.name: content
arguments.description: The transcript or content of the video

analyze_logs.name: Advanced Log Analysis & Debugging
analyze_logs.description: Comprehensive log analysis template incorporating advanced debugging strategies used by senior developers and SREs for systematic root cause analysis

arguments.name: logs
arguments.description: The complete log entries to analyze

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: Additional context: system state, recent changes, user reports, etc.

code_review_optimization_chain.name: Comprehensive Code Review Chain
code_review_optimization_chain.description: Systematic code review covering structure, functionality, security, performance, optimization, and quality assurance using symbolic tool chain.

arguments.name: target_code
arguments.description: The code to be reviewed and optimized

arguments.name: language_framework
arguments.description: Programming language and framework being used

arguments.name: performance_goals
arguments.description: Specific performance targets or optimization goals

component_flow_analysis.name: Component Flow Analysis
component_flow_analysis.description: Comprehensive component review that tracks data flow, lifecycle, dependencies, and integration points

arguments.name: component_path
arguments.description: Path to the component file (e.g., src/components/UserProfile.tsx)

arguments.name: component_code
arguments.description: The complete component source code to analyze

arguments.name: framework
arguments.description: Framework being used (React, Vue, Angular, Svelte, etc.)

create_modularization_plan.name: Create Modularization Plan
create_modularization_plan.description: Creates a detailed plan for splitting a file into smaller, more maintainable modules based on analysis of its structure and dependencies.

arguments.name: file_path
arguments.description: Path to the file being modularized

arguments.name: analysis_results
arguments.description: Results from the file structure analysis

detect_project_commands.name: Project Commands Detection
detect_project_commands.description: Intelligently detects and configures project validation commands (lint, test, build) for different project types with Enhanced CAGEERF integration

arguments.name: project_type
arguments.description: Type of project (nodejs, rust, python, go, etc.)

dev_sync.name: Dev Sync
dev_sync.description: Sync plugin source to Claude Code cache for development. Run after modifying hooks or plugin.json.

generate_comprehensive_claude_md.name: Comprehensive CLAUDE.md Generator
generate_comprehensive_claude_md.description: Generates comprehensive CLAUDE.md files with all 6 development criteria, Enhanced CAGEERF integration, and project-specific configurations

arguments.name: project_commands
arguments.description: JSON object with detected project commands

implementation_gap_analysis.name: Implementation Gap Analysis
implementation_gap_analysis.description: Identifies gaps between documented/expected behavior and actual implementation. Finds schema definitions without enforcement, interfaces without implementations, and promises without delivery.

arguments.name: focus_area
arguments.description: The subsystem or feature area to analyze (e.g., 'gate enforcement', 'hot reload', 'chain execution')

arguments.name: symptom
arguments.description: The observed behavior that triggered this analysis (e.g., 'blocking gates don't actually block')

arguments.name: related_files
arguments.description: Known files related to the issue (optional, comma-separated paths)

integration_assessment.name: Integration Assessment
integration_assessment.description: Assess integration effort: compatibility, migration path, breaking changes. Step 3 of the tech evaluation chain.

arguments.name: library
arguments.description: The library or framework being evaluated

arguments.name: current_stack
arguments.description: Current tech stack for compatibility assessment

arguments.name: technical_findings
arguments.description: Key findings from the technical deep dive

library_overview.name: Library Overview
library_overview.description: Quick assessment of a library/framework: popularity, maintenance, ecosystem fit. Step 1 of the tech evaluation chain.

arguments.name: library
arguments.description: The library or framework to evaluate (e.g., 'zod', 'react-query', 'prisma')

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: Your project context and what problem you're solving

arguments.name: current_stack
arguments.description: Current tech stack (optional, helps assess compatibility)

rule_refinement.name: Rule Refinement Guide
rule_refinement.description: Guides systematic refinement of CLAUDE.md rules across the three-layer hierarchy (Global → Applications → Project). Enforces consolidation-first approach to prevent rule sprawl.

arguments.name: issue_description
arguments.description: The architectural issue or pattern violation that needs to be addressed with new rules

arguments.name: codebase_path
arguments.description: Path to the project codebase (for project-specific rules)

strategicImplement.name: Strategic Implementation
strategicImplement.description: Systematically implement a plan phase with architectural alignment, compatibility checking, and progress tracking

arguments.name: plan_path
arguments.description: Path to the plan document to implement (e.g., plans/current/feature-plan.md)

tech_evaluation_chain.name: Technology Evaluation Chain
tech_evaluation_chain.description: Complete library/framework evaluation workflow: overview, deep dive, integration assessment, and final recommendation. Demonstrates blocking vs advisory gates.

arguments.name: library
arguments.description: The library or framework to evaluate (e.g., 'zod', 'react-query', 'prisma')

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: Your project context and what problem you're solving

arguments.name: current_stack
arguments.description: Current tech stack for compatibility assessment

tech_recommendation.name: Technology Recommendation
tech_recommendation.description: Final go/no-go recommendation with actionable next steps and code examples. Step 4 of the tech evaluation chain.

arguments.name: library
arguments.description: The library or framework being evaluated

arguments.name: evaluation_summary
arguments.description: Summary of findings from previous steps

technical_deep_dive.name: Technical Deep Dive
technical_deep_dive.description: In-depth technical analysis: API design, performance, security, edge cases. Step 2 of the tech evaluation chain. BLOCKING gate requires verified claims.

arguments.name: library
arguments.description: The library or framework being evaluated

arguments.name: concerns
arguments.description: Specific concerns from the overview step to investigate

transform_code_to_modules.name: Transform Code to Modules
transform_code_to_modules.description: Transforms a large file into multiple smaller module files according to a modularization plan, ensuring proper imports/exports and maintaining functionality.

arguments.name: original_code
arguments.description: The original source code to be modularized

arguments.name: modularization_plan
arguments.description: The detailed plan for how to split the code

readme_improver.name: readme_improver
readme_improver.description: Rewrites documentation to align with the project's 'Builder/Hacker' ethos: practical, concise, quick-start focused, and free of enterprise jargon.

arguments.name: content
arguments.description: The current README content, draft, or feature list to document.

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: The location/purpose of the README (e.g., 'Root', 'Server Internal', 'Component'). affects structure

create_gate.name: Create Gate
create_gate.description: Guided quality gate creation with examples and validation. Outputs structured JSON for resource_manager.

arguments.name: description
arguments.description: Brief description of what the gate validates

arguments.name: guidanceFile
arguments.description: Path to guidance.md file (default creates inline guidance)

create_methodology.name: Create Methodology
create_methodology.description: Guided framework creation with examples from CAGEERF, ReACT. Outputs structured JSON for resource_manager.

arguments.name: enabled
arguments.description: Whether the methodology is enabled (set to true)

arguments.name: system_prompt_guidance
arguments.description: Multiline guidance with **Phase**: format for injection

arguments.name: phases
arguments.description: Array of phase objects [{id, name, description}]

arguments.name: quality_indicators
arguments.description: Keywords/patterns for quality detection per phase

arguments.name: judge_prompt
arguments.description: Custom judge prompt content for %judge modifier

create_prompt.name: Create Prompt
create_prompt.description: Guided prompt/chain creation with examples and validation. Outputs structured JSON for resource_manager.

arguments.name: description
arguments.description: Brief description of what the prompt does

notepage.name: Notepage
notepage.description: Structured reference note for future use

identify_options.name: Identify Options
identify_options.description: Identify 3-5 viable options for the decision

quick_decision.name: Quick Decision Chain
quick_decision.description: Fast decision-making workflow with concise prompts. Identifies options, weighs tradeoffs, and provides a recommendation.

arguments.name: topic
arguments.description: The decision topic or question to analyze

arguments.name: constraints
arguments.description: Any constraints or requirements to consider

reference_demo.name: Reference Syntax Demo
reference_demo.description: Demonstrates template reference features - {{ref:id}} for prompt inclusion and {{script:id}} for inline script execution

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: The text to analyze with the word_count script tool

arguments.name: topic
arguments.description: Optional topic name for the introduction (demonstrates reference feature)

shared_intro.name: Shared Introduction Template
shared_intro.description: A reusable introduction block demonstrating the {{ref:id}} prompt reference syntax. Reference this prompt from other templates using {{ref:shared_intro}}

create_docs_chain.name: Documentation Generation Chain
create_docs_chain.description: A comprehensive chain for creating high-quality technical documentation with proper structure, formatting, and best practices

arguments.name: project_info
arguments.description: Information about the project to document

arguments.name: doc_type
arguments.description: Type of documentation to create (e.g., API Reference, User Guide)

arguments.name: depth_level
arguments.description: Depth level of the documentation (default: intermediate)

diagnose.name: Codebase Diagnostics
diagnose.description: Systematically diagnose issues in codebases including bugs, performance problems, security vulnerabilities, architecture issues, and technical debt

arguments.name: scope
arguments.description: Specific files, directories, or areas to analyze (e.g., 'src/auth/**', 'performance issues', 'securi

arguments.name: symptoms
arguments.description: Reported symptoms or problems (e.g., 'slow build times', 'memory leaks', 'failing tests')

hiring_manager_code_eval.name: Hiring Manager Codebase Evaluation
hiring_manager_code_eval.description: A hiring manager prompt for evaluating a codebase against job listing requirements.

minimal_plan.name: Minimal Implementation Plan
minimal_plan.description: Creates implementation plans that maximize reuse of existing systems and avoid over-engineering. Forces explicit justification for any new files or abstractions.

arguments.name: feature
arguments.description: The feature or functionality to implement

arguments.name: existing_systems
arguments.description: Known existing systems/files that might be relevant (comma-separated)

pr_approval_summary.name: PR Approval Summary
pr_approval_summary.description: Final summary and approval recommendation based on all previous review steps.

pr_diff_analysis.name: PR Diff Analysis
pr_diff_analysis.description: Analyzes a pull request diff to understand scope, changes, and areas requiring focused review.

pr_performance_check.name: PR Performance Check
pr_performance_check.description: Performance-focused review of PR changes. Uses advisory gate - warns but does not block.

arguments.name: previous_analysis
arguments.description: Output from the diff analysis step

arguments.name: security_verdict
arguments.description: Result from the security audit step

pr_review_chain.name: PR Review Chain
pr_review_chain.description: Complete PR review workflow: diff analysis, security audit (blocking), performance check (advisory), and approval summary. Demonstrates gate enforcement modes.

arguments.name: diff_content
arguments.description: The full diff content to review

pr_security_audit.name: PR Security Audit
pr_security_audit.description: Security-focused review of PR changes. Uses blocking gate - must pass before merge approval.

arguments.name: previous_analysis
arguments.description: Output from the diff analysis step
